ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Ogres in W. Karana
ygData.msgSnippet: These guys I think will out aggro Lament song range. I ve been close enough just to read their names, and I had at least 1 shaman and one guard (a
ygData.messageBody:
These guys I think will out aggro Lament song range. I've been close enough
just to read their names, and I had at least 1 shaman and one guard (a
Shadowknight) come running. They don't have quite the aggro range of a
dragon, but a decent one nonetheless. I'm not one who's camped them really,
only a driveby on occasion if they're uncamped when I breeze through. Goonda
drops a few nice pieces I can give to the guild. He's a pain to kite, as he
is a shaman, has SoW, heals, slows, nukes, etc... I get rid of his pet first
by charming Goonda, and have him beat his mutt down.

My guess is <30 for the guards, 35 tops for Goonda?

Pava
CT
